item.description: JANUARY 18 (Friday) SINGLES SNOWFLAKE DANCE at Nuchie's in Bristol from 8 pm to 12 am. This is the place to be! Be sure to come and bring your friends. Enjoy the evening and dance the night away to the music of our DJ - D&J Productions. There will be a delicious buffet from 8 to 9:30 pm to enjoy. We usually have a great turnout for our dances. Dress to impress and door prizes. Admission $15. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 164 Central Street: I-84 to Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), go to end, turn right, at 2nd light facility on right.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the dance hall entrance to greet you.
item.why: This is a great singles dance to attend. Bring your friends and enjoy a fun evening!

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Snowflake Dance
